channel.title: Group » New Riders Of The Purple Sage
channel.description: Group » New Riders Of The Purple Sage

item.title: Jerry Garcia
item.description: Jerome John 'Jerry' Garcia was an American singer-songwriter and guitarist, best known for his work as the lead guitarist and as a vocalist with the band the Grateful Dead, which came to prominence during the counterculture era in the 1960s. Although he disavowed the role, Garcia was viewed by many as the leader or 'spokesman' of the group.

item.title: John Dawson
item.description: John Collins Dawson IV, nicknamed 'Marmaduke', was an American musician, singer, and songwriter. He was best known as the leader and co-founder of the country rock band the New Riders of the Purple Sage. He sang lead vocals on most of the band’s songs.
